blurb: Snatch the Police Chief and replace him with a robot? Bomb city streets to splinters? Mr. X and the Syndicate surface once again to hatch the ultimate evil plot! Blaze Fielding launches a furious counterattack with Axel, Skate and cyborg newcomer Dr. Zan! Totally new moves including jump kicks, power slams and spin punches and secret attacks! Out-RAGE-ous 2-player combo attacks and head-to-head battles! Four bone-busting endings - the better you get, the more you see! Thrashing digitized sound FX and incredible street tunes! [GameFAQs]
